summary:
Name: Anita
Race: Nord
Level: 7
Quests completed: Cleared first village, Just arrived at whiterun. 
Inventory has complete daedric armor set, triss set, black sacrament set for the pictures, along with assorted items.
descriptionHtml:
Mods required for the desired look.

Female Warpaints by KrimsonLust (warpaint number 5)
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente (standard) 
Tattoos for CBBE V3 Curvy and SLIM Body by candymanXXL (tattoo 2)
Better Females by Bella by BellaGail (makeup version 3)
Extended Slider Colors by Expired
Lovely Hairstyles by sn00p
Nightingale retex - Black Sacrament - craftable ninja armor by AmethystDeceiver
Gizmodians Scars by Gizmodian and Xenius
Daedric female armor replacer by MaikCG
CBBE Daedric Female by Laxi2610
Triss Outfitt For TES V Skyrim by Fraper
Covereyes by mrLenski

You will still get save relics error, I have a lot of mods installed. 

No longer require the console commands to get the vibrant coloured hairs. 


I\'ve restarted the game so many times, just trying to get the perfect look for my character and I\'m finally content. The hair doesn\'t clip with the sacrament armor and it doesn\'t look like there\'s a sparkly block on the back of her head. I added the pictures for daedric and triss just for aesthetic value. There is still a slight line on the neck, but that\'s not possible to fix right now without the CK. Hopefully that will be addressed soon. Enjoy her as much as I will. 

Just sell the armor sets for gold if you want a fresh start with her because she has the regular armor and weapons obtained playing up to the start of whiterun.
author: ArsenicTouch
